title: siva siva siva bO
sahitya:
shiva shiva shiva bhO mahAdEva shambhO shivA ramaNa mamAparAdham kshyama sva 

(shiva)



anupallavi



sarva sarvAnandakara akhilANDa prabhO bhava sAgara tAraka akShayalinga vibhO 

(shiva)



caraNam



namastE sthANO praLaya kAla jagadbhakSaka mamaka camaka prakaTita rudra sookta tOSaka

kAmArE tripurArE kumbodbhava nutipAtra kAmEshvari vallabha kubEra mitra



madhyama kaalam



kapAli kAlabhairavI trivikhyata shrI vidyA vinuta nAdanAmakriya tOShita 

(shiva)
